physical_appearance: "This is a page from the magazine ""Journal des Voyages"" (as seen in the heading). Its title is ""Ethnographie d'Extreme-Orient Les Tyoes de Singapour."" There are coloured images of men and children in turbans running diagonally across the page; dividing the text into two sections. "
sgcool_label_text: "This is a page taken from the Parisian weekly magazine Journal des Voyages. It contains writeups on the ""Ethnography of the Far East"" and ""The Types of Singapore""
title_text: Print from Journal Des Voyages on the various native types of Singapore
subject_terms_1: Orientalism  ethnicity  cultural pluralism travel sketches  weeklies (publications)
subject_terms_2: Lithography Publications Periodicals Publishing Cultural pluralism Orientalism  Singapore  East Asia  Prints  Allers, Christian Wilhelm, 1857-1915
